title: Class buys tech from its own founder’s first edtech company for $210 million - Yahoo Finance
content: Class buys tech from its own founder’s first edtech company for $210 million  Yahoo Finance
description: Before starting Class, a Zoom-friendly virtual instruction tool, Michael Chasen was the founder of Blackboard, one of the first cloud solutions for education on the market.  While Class has some nods toward Chasen's previous gig — such as the ability to integrate CMS systems right into the classroom tool — today it is announcing a much closer integration.  Class tells TechCrunch that it has acquired Collaborate, Blackboard's virtual class tool for an undisclosed price.
